org.hibernate.boot.models.internal
 
org.hibernate.boot.models.spi
 
org.hibernate.boot.spi
A range of SPIs allowing integration with—and customization of—the process of building metadata.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.boot.models.spi used by org.hibernate.boot.internal

    GlobalRegistrations
    Registrations which are considered global, collected across annotations and XML mappings.
